channel.title: Can't access my account on my server
channel.description: I created an account on my server and the first time I logged on was successful, now when I try to log on it tells me my information is invalid, is there a way to check passwords? The account has owner rights

item.title: Can't access my account on my server
item.dc:creator: @death_wish1234 death wish1234
item.description:
@death_wish1234 wrote:

If your password happens to be encrypted I suggest either making a new account with the password you want and copy it over, or deleting your accounts password in the char file, login and use ::changepassword or you can even add/use the command ::getpass and do it that way since it decrypts the password, though you may have to alter the code to allow the checking of passwords when the player is offline. Good luck, you should have enough information here to fix it

Read full topic
item.source: Can't access my account on my server

item.title: Can't access my account on my server
item.dc:creator: @Soulxs Soulxs
item.description:
@Soulxs wrote:

Go to your character folder, find the account and the password should be right at the top (under player name).
With some sources the password is encrypted, i donâ€™t know how to check the password then.
